title: What are the most philosophical views on human nature? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most philosophical? I’m not intending to offend, but I’m not sure this makes a whole lotta sense. I guess, technically, all views on human nature are philosophic, even the scientific understandings because they require some bit of philosophical understanding to come up with. I’m sorry, I’m just making all this more confusing lol. There’s all sorts of understandings on human nature though. There’s the Christian view, and Buddhist, and the Materialist, and so on. And you can probably even break these higher categories up themselves as not all materialists might agree with one another. What exactly were you looking for though here?
